sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect'; import {selectCartTotal} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import { selectCartItems} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import './checkout.styles.scss'; import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.componenet' import StripeCheckoutButton from '../../components/stripe-button/stripe-button.component' const CheckoutPage=({cartItems, total})=>(
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem=>( ) ) }
TOTAL: ${total}
*Please use the following test credit card for payments*
4242 4242 4242 4242 -Exp: 01/20 -cvv:123
) const mapStateToProps=createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage)
